properties.displayName: Suspicious Registry Modification From ADS Via Regini.EXE
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (FolderPath endswith "\\regini.exe" or ProcessVersionInfoOriginalFileName =~ "REGINI.EXE") and ProcessCommandLine matches regex ":[^ \\\\]"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects the import of an alternate data stream with regini.exe, regini.exe can be used to modify registry keys.
